Simple Sentence: My cat was acting weird. It was just that she was too sleepy.
Compound Sentence: My cat was acting weird BUT it was just that she was too sleepy.
Complex Sentence: Although my cat was acting weird, it was just that she was too sleepy.
Compound-Complex Sentence: Although my cat was acting weird, it turns out to be that she was just too sleepy, since she didn't get any sleep while she stayed awake for the rest of the night playing with my cotton stuffed toy-mouse.
